Universal Hobbies UH2460 Renault 5 GT Turbo 1989 Rallye C么te d'Ivoire Winner A. Oreille/G. Thimonier

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://www.universalhobbies.net/musee/voiture/echelle-1-43/renault/produit-renault-super-5-gt-turbo-n-9-ivory-coast-rallye-1989-winner-driver-oreille-3861-0.html

Only WRC win for Alain Orielle.
6th WRC win for Renault.
Only WRC win for 5 GT Turbo.

Alain Oreille drove Renaults for most of his career, including all 28 of his WRC starts. He took back-to-back wins in the FIA Cup for Drivers of Production Cars in 1989 and 1990 in a Renault 5 GT Turbo. By winning the Rallye C么te d'Ivoire in 1989 he became the first and only driver to win a WRC round in a Group N car. Group N cars were basically standard road cars as the modifications allowed are few even requiring full stock interior trim including rear seats!
